DOC.brief_summary: Infants are exposed to either continuous bright light continuous near darkness or unstructured combination of the two. The investigators primary objective is to determine the effectiveness cycled light and near darkness on growth in preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Compare of Effectiveness Cycled Light or Near Darkness on Growth Parameters in Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: <32 gestational weeks preterm infants Major congenital anomaly Small for gestation age Grade IIIIV intracranial hemorrhage
